table.name: vtiger_rsnmedias
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnmedias` ( `rsnmediasid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `nom` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsntypesmedia` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rubriquepreferee` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsncountry` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsnregion` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `mediacomment` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnmediasid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnmediascf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnmediascf` ( `rsnmediasid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnmediasid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
